roles.label: SOC Manager
roles.description: Responsible for Incident Investigation and other remediation and containment-related tasks.

roles.label: Full App Permissions
roles.description: Essentially the root user, use carefully

roles.label: SOC Analyst
roles.description: Responsible for Alert Triaging, false-positive filtering, and escalating potentially malicious alerts to Incidents.

roles.label: Read-Only User
roles.description: Access with viewing rights only, no editing or modification capabilities.

rules.label: Notify On Pending Internal Manual Input
